data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Microgecko Nikolsky, 1907 (Sauria: Gekkonidae) from southern Iran

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Gholamifard, Ali, Rastegar-Pouyani, Nasrullah, Rastegar-Pouyani, Eskandar, Khosravani, Azar, Yousefkhani, Seyyed Saeed Hosseinian, Oraei, Hamzeh (2016): A new species of the genus Microgecko Nikolsky, 1907 (Sauria: Gekkonidae) from southern Iran. Zootaxa 4093 (1), DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4093.1.2
